title: Why am i unable to launch the game?
body: above where it says North America (my region), it says unavailable and i cant launch the game.

replies.body:
You weren't able to log in because our Login Service was down. After some investigation and troubleshooting, we were able to bring the service back online and you should no longer have issues logging in.

Let me know if this is not the case.
Look for a post titled "riot compensation for downed server" and spread the word

You lack the required stats to launch the game and i think you are lacking the vital +1 Intelligence to click the yellow icon and go the server status page. Then follow Satana to the riot compensation thread i will see you there.
